mapper.select: /* 부서트리 (deptMapper.getDeptList) */ WITH recursive cte ( cust_no , par_dept_no , dept_no , dept_nm , level , prt_seq , path , used_yn ) AS ( SELECT a.cust_no , a.par_dept_no , a.dept_no , a.dept_nm , 1 AS level , a.prt_seq , lpad(a.dept_no::text,5,'0') , a.used_yn FROM dept_info a WHERE a.par_dept_no = 0 and a.cust_no =#{custNo} UNION ALL SELECT b.cust_no , b.par_dept_no , b.dept_no , b.dept_nm , c.level+1 AS level , b.prt_seq , path ||lpad(b.dept_no::text,5,'0') , b.used_yn FROM dept_info b JOIN cte c ON b.par_dept_no = c.dept_no where b.cust_no =#{custNo} and b.used_yn = 'Y' and b.disp_yn = 'Y' ) SELECT * FROM cte order by path

select max(a.level) as menu_depth from( WITH recursive cte ( par_dept_no , dept_no , dept_nm , level , prt_seq , path , used_yn , cust_no ) AS ( SELECT a.par_dept_no , a.dept_no , a.dept_nm , 1 AS level , a.prt_seq , lpad(a.dept_no::text,5,'0') , a.used_yn , a.cust_no FROM dept_info a WHERE a.par_dept_no = 0 UNION ALL SELECT b.par_dept_no , b.dept_no , b.dept_nm , c.level+1 AS level , b.prt_seq , path ||lpad(b.dept_no::text,5,'0') , b.used_yn , b.cust_no FROM dept_info b JOIN cte c ON b.par_dept_no = c.dept_no ) SELECT * FROM cte WHERE 1 = 1 and cte.cust_no = #{custNo} order by path ) a --부서
